{{Marvel Database:Organization Template | Image = Santomon Corporation (Earth-616) from Monsters Unleashed Vol 3 9 001.png | Name = Santomon Corporation | EditorialNames = | Aliases = | Leaders = | CurrentMembers = | FormerMembers = | Identity = Public | Affiliation = | Allies = [[Kei Kawade (Earth-616)|Kid Kaiju]], [[Scragg (Earth-616)|Scragg]] | Enemies = | Origin = | Reality = Earth-616 | Status = Active | BaseOfOperations = [[Santomon Campus]] | PlaceOfFormation = | PlaceOfDissolution = | Creators = Justin Jordan; Francesco Gaston | First = Monsters Unleashed Vol 3 9 | History = An Agribusiness company experimenting with both food science and [[Pym Particles]], the Santomon Corporation accidentally exposed a beehive to the Pym Particles, creating a hive of giant, confused bees.{{r|Monsters Unleashed Vol 3 9}} [[Gloria Clark (Earth-616)|Gloria Clark]] of [[Damage Control (Earth-616)|Damage Control]] arranged for [[Kei Kawade (Earth-616)|Kid Kaiju]] and [[Scragg (Earth-616)|The Mighty Scragg]] to visit the [[Santomon Campus|campus]] and deal with the bees.{{r|Monsters Unleashed Vol 3 9}} Thanks to Scragg's knowledge of Hivish, a peaceful resolution was reached and the bees left Santomon, relocating their hive to [[Mu (Monster Island)|Mu]].{{r|Monsters Unleashed Vol 3 9}} | Equipment =
* [[Pym Particles]]{{r|Monsters Unleashed Vol 3 9}} | Transportation = | Weapons = | Notes = | Trivia = | Links = }}
